website_summaries.verdict: A rich, invigorating body butter that softens and moisturizes skin without the use of unwanted parabens.
pros: Thick consistency, but feels light on skin
cons: Some have said it leaves a thin residue on your skin

customer_reviews.title: Like silk
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back and ordering more and more. I am giving it away as holiday gifts to all my friends, when we meet for lunch or attend rehearsals for The Nutcracker together. It's the perfect giveaway. The reason I love it so much is how smoothly it goes on, like silk, and how it leaves your hands so soft and dry, not greasy at all. It is the best lotion I've every had, and I'm 70 years old, so I've gone through a lot of lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Gulliver

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion that’s not greasy and the scent is fresh and fades nicely
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lotion. Not only does this lotion do an amazing job of moisturizing with out feeling greesy but it smells fresh and clean. The fragrance fades nicely. So if you’re in a healthcare field (or any field where scents are frowned on) you could still wear this and not worry about “stinking”. This isn’t a body butter, so if your looking for that kind of product, this isn’t it. It’s a nice light lotion that does a great job of keeping scaly, dry skin away. I bought this at a great price on Amazon. If I would have bought it at Ulta it would have cost me double.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsgus

customer_reviews.title: No other lotion compares
customer_reviews.text: I used to have trouble with dry itchy legs after hot showers. This lotion fixed my problem. Now when I use Bath and Body Works lotion it feels waxy. Other lotions do not absorb well and feel like it is sitting on top on your skin. I have added Bliss to my everyday morning routine post shower within 2 minutes while my pores are still open. My husband comments often on how soft my skin is. I simply love this lotion. I've recommended it to many and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Cin-D

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be...
customer_reviews.text: When Bliss first came out with this body butter, it was luxurious and creamy and delicious. Over the years, the formula has changed a great deal and now it’s a much watered-down version that leaves my skin needing more because it does not moisturize much at all. Plus they advertise that there are no “harsh chemicals” but there still are chemicals in the ingredient list that aren’t good for you. This is not a “clean” beauty product like some other brands are - just have to do a little research to find them and choose wisely! I’m returning this lotion now because it just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t that moisturizing and didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Smelled amazing but I expected the body butter to be more moisturizing. Despite layering it on, I didn’t feel too much moisture get locked in. It ran out quickly since I had to repeatedly use it. If you’re looking for something actually moisturizing AND good-smelling, I recommend Jergens Argan Oil Infused Moisturizer. It’s not a body butter but it smells great, lasts long, actually keeps you moisturized, and contains way more product.
customer_reviews.author: Noora

customer_reviews.title: Smells Scrumptious, moisturizing and protects
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion soooo much! It is a little bit on the thicker side but I prefer medium to almost thick rather than thin to really thin lotions. It takes a little longer to apply than thin lotion but my skin actually feels soft, moisturized and protected. I absolutely love the smell. I wanna eat myself! I didnt know how I felt about walking around smelling like food but once I tried it, I fell in love. I also really like bliss products, not all but this one is by far my fave!
customer_reviews.author: boobiesnak

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this lotion. He says the smell is light and it makes your skin smooth and soft. The price is kind of on the higher side, but i suppose if you like a lotion you'll be willing to be sweet to your wife so she gets you it for Valentine's day.
customer_reviews.author: SpunkyLabreche

customer_reviews.title: Nothing unique
customer_reviews.text: To me there is nothing special about this lotion, and nothing last long with it. Not the smell, moisture, or product. Just get something from your Walmart, your local drugstore. You will be just as happy and save you money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Logan

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Smelled old and not like original...threw away and purchased another straight from Bliss!
customer_reviews.author: Andi Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Over Hyped
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected this body butter to be thick and luxurious. It is not. While it is not greasy, and does absorb well, that is because it isn't very moisturizing. A few minutes after applying, I felt like I needed to put some on again, especially my hands. The scent is almost non-existent, which is disappointing, as the scent is lovely - there's just not a lot of it. Unfortunately this will be my first & last purchase of Bliss.
customer_reviews.author: aleigh_powers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, No negative reactions. I have very sensitive skin but this cream absorbs easily and keeps my skin moist for a long time. Particularly good to put on after a shower or bath. This was a second order which means as long as this product is sold, I will be buying.
customer_reviews.author: RachelSun

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged but not nearly as creamy or scented as I expected from other reviews. I use other Bliss products so had high hopes for another one in their line but was disappointed. Will not purchase again.😞
customer_reviews.author: Pinkshoplady

customer_reviews.title: NOT a butter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an everyday body moisturizer with a light scent. This smells LOVELY, but hardly moisturizes and my skin felt dry and thirsty within a few hours. Definitely NOT a thick body butter, and barely a hand cream. Disappointing overall, and as other reviews stated, I went through it VERY quickly! Keep shopping if you want a daily body moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: K Brizzle

customer_reviews.title: So So Smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this b/c the smell sounded like it would be amazing but it was just ok. A very light and airy sage with even less lemon scents. The lotion itself is light and whipped and when rubbed turns a bit liquidy but does absorb fast.
customer_reviews.author: chinina

customer_reviews.title: Top Ratings - All Time FAVE Body Butter!
customer_reviews.text: This has long been my top choice for winter skin, heels, or anything that needs extra rich moisture. All the scents are fresh and clean. The lemon & sage is soft and the shea butter gives it the perfect texture. Stays on all day for me. And usually it runs $30 in the department store!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Lefever

customer_reviews.title: Love these products!
customer_reviews.text: I travel overseas and found Bliss at the Aloft hotel. I fell in love with the lotion, soap, body wash, and shampoo/conditioner. I loved it so much that I purchased these for my girlfriend back home. She LOVES them! My only wish is that they sold the scent that I feel in love with here too, it is the tried+blue.
customer_reviews.author: Nicol Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been my whole life?!?
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. The scent is lovely, it moisturizes well, and it is not greasy at all which is a big turn off for me with lotions. It is also cruelty free, another requirement. The only thing I would change is the fact the larger quantity is actually more expensive per ounce. I go through the 6.7 Oz in ~2 weeks and would love a less wasteful option.
customer_reviews.author: Jctayl01

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Body Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other things, but always come back to the Bliss Body Lotion...it has the perfect consistency (not too thick, not to watery - kind of like the Victoria's Secret Lotions that used to come with pumps), absorbs fast, and has a scent that smells fresh but doesn't linger too long. Doesn't stick to clothes or sheets or leave behind a sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: LUDA!

customer_reviews.title: I love the Bliss Products!
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered the Bliss products when my husband and I stayed at the W Hotel on Lexington in NYC. All I know is this product truly moisturizes my skin and I just love the fresh lemony fragrance. I always feel refreshed! So glad I ordered the body wash as well! Simply Heavenly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My spouse loves Bliss Lemon & Sage Body Butter
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product and wants a year’s supply for birthday, Christmas, or whatever. Bliss makes her happy and that makes me happy. (It does seem to be an excellent product.)
customer_reviews.author: I. B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good! Usually lemon scents are so overpowering, but not this one. It does seem heavy right after you apply it, but after it settles it's such a soft and lovely lemon scents. It absorbed into my skin very quickly and didn't leave a sticky feeling or anything unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion, it's not greasy and moisturizes perfectly. I use it at work for my hands and within a few seconds it absorbs into the skin. I looked at other seller prices and this one is by far the best. Others sell for $15 to $35.
customer_reviews.author: slt

customer_reviews.title: THE body cream to have
customer_reviews.text: My go to body cream for the past 7 yrs!!! Absorbs in a minute, great mosturizer I use it daily for my hands specially in the winter. Also great to extend your tan in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY Moisturizer for the body!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all over, except face, and I love the way it softens my skin. The scent is a bit light, so it won't conflict with any other scent I'm wearing, and it's lovely lotion that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: nice smell
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was very thick and I like the nice smell of lemon and sage. The second one was not thick enough and the nice smell was not there.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Lovely citrus scents
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the price, creaminess and fresh clean citrus scents of Bliss products. I am scent sensitive and these are subtle and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I love the lemon/sage fragrance! I also love the quality of lotion. I have used this Bliss product in the past, and it is just as I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: B.K. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It must be good, love the way Lemon & Sage smells but has a lasting effect, especially during dry winter months... have reordered multiple times.... and writing a review, I must like it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Flaim

customer_reviews.title: The Best Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the past 5 years or more and just love it. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary K.

customer_reviews.title: Scent Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I'm slightly disappointed. I love the smell of this but the scent does not last long at all. It does moisturize well though.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Farrant

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Save your money. The scent is nice but this product does not moisturize. I am going back to Perilier. Now that is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Very subtle, not greasy or overly perfumed
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few moisturizers I've used that doesn't feel like I'm slathering chicken fat on my skin. The lemony scent is perfect and doesn't linger too long after application, so you needn't worry about smelling a certain way.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My favorite moisturizer! Smells so nice and keeps my skin moist after I have been to the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: good moisturizing lotion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion after using a sample from a hotel. It has a light scent, but is thicker than a lot of lotions. It is named 'body butter' but is not as thick as most body butters I have used (which is a plus for me). I like that the tube had a seal on top so I knew it had not been used or tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and do not believe this is the same. This lotion is very cheap water based, does not spread let alone provide moisture. I am guessing this must be a fake because Past use I didn’t have the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: patricia gudrian

customer_reviews.title: This is a top notch product and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. Clean going on, no stickiness after apply. Crisp feeling, great scent.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Lemon Sage Body Butter is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Have used Lemon Sage Bliss Body Butter for years and love it. The scent is wonderful and light enough to wear any of my perfumes with it. I buy the large 32 ounce size and keep one in each bathroom. The only negative is that the pump becomes less effective as the container gets emptier. Regardless I love my Bliss.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works on rough feet so well
customer_reviews.text: Bliss is the best cream I’ve ever found to treat the roughy area on the heels of my feet. It is amazing and the scent is natural not fake .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stickley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Bliss lemon body butter for many years, I love the scent and the texture. It’s terrific!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: this product has a nice scent and makes skin soft but it wears off. It also doesn't moisturize well.
customer_reviews.author: briana robinson

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging TWICE.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but first jar received was cracked and leaked in the box and the replacement jar has a pump that doesn’t work. Had to scoop out the product and put in an empty CeraVe jar. Should have just bought another jar of CeraVe cream instead!
customer_reviews.author: pmc

customer_reviews.title: Best body cream with very nice scents (and even scentless).
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body cream for many years...great for winter, not too heavy for summer. We used to be able to purchase at some discount clothing stores in a much larger size. Was devastated when that stopped being sold outside of Bliss Spa. Wishing for the larger size at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Baghdassarian

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a sample at a W hotel and went looking for it after it ran out. Great price. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Light & Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! It applies so easily & feels so soft. It don't feel watery or greasy at all. My new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Shorty203

customer_reviews.title: Quality Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like all 3 scents of the body butter...very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Kay in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product from a friend and it works well. I had the same expectation when I purchased it from Amazon. However, this product didn't leave the same softness nor moisturize well. I checked the product ID # and it was manufactured Sept. 2018. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is not greasy very lightweight. I wish they had one that smelled like Shea Butter
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: The only lotion I will use
customer_reviews.text: I generally don’t like using lotion due to the greasy feeling, but this absorbs well and doesn’t leave me feeling gooey. The fragrance is not overpowering either.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: Best lotion ever. Can't survive without it. I have been buying it for years.
customer_reviews.author: I.G.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Already on my 2nd tube, ultra moisturizing and a scent to die for! 🍋💛
customer_reviews.author: Serena L.

customer_reviews.title: The Same product used by several high end hotels
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this product for a while glad to have found it
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not what it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this product for 15 years. Originally, I purchased directly from blissworld. I was pleased to see this available on Amazon. This is absolutely not the same body butter. It is very thin (liquid), and not moisturizing at all. Very disappointing. I guess I got what I paid for, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Colder weather leaves my skin dry and itchy, after a week of daily use of this body butter, my skin is soft and smooth again! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: aleila

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a body butter, nor does it feel like the Bliss lotion of before. It went on like water and my skin was dry in a few hours. They may have changed their formula, and if so, find another brand to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benicole05

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It keeps my skin soft and moisturized. I also think there may be a hidden benefit......when I wore it, I was the only one in my group not bitten by mosquitoes! I think the scent really helped with that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't too keen on the smell
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too keen on the smell, but it's not like it smelled bad. I'm sure it would be perfect for someone else who liked the scent. It came very highly rated from a friend, so I know that it's just right for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Neddie

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance lasts
customer_reviews.text: Bought to accompany same-named body wash. Leaves skin soft and fragrant.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: The lemon fragrance is very uplifting. I love it. It makes my skin so soft.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received a sample in the mail and gave it to me for my purse. I used it up right away. I ordered a large tube on Amazon and I use it most everyday.
customer_reviews.author: TESS_49

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, have been using for years. Great lemon fragrance that doesn't linger too long. Product is moisturizing without being greasy. It's just right! And I'm excited it's available on Amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of lemon and sage and the large sized bottle will last me for a while!
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do ya!
customer_reviews.text: Very good moisturizer. You don't need much to soften your entire body.
customer_reviews.author: GumboSoup

customer_reviews.title: Bliss!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic moisturizer. It won’t leave your skin feeling greasy or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Sprayberry

customer_reviews.title: Best body cream ever!
customer_reviews.text: This body butter is amazing, the thick consistency makes it easy to apply & the moisture it provides is phenomenal. You will also like the clean fresh scent. I tube lasted me a whole year!
customer_reviews.author: LA211

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Brands!
customer_reviews.text: I use Bliss products occasionally, and every time I do, I think, "Wow! I wish I owned every bit of their line!" The body butter is smooth and hydrating, and leaves no greasy residue. Plus, it smells amazing, like a spa!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased multiples and gifted to my mother. She was very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Oppy in Life

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS A DREAM COME TRUE!
customer_reviews.text: I TOTALLY LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! SMELLS LIKE HEAVEN, MAKES YOU FEEL SO SOFT AND LUXURIOUS 🤩
customer_reviews.author: THANX GORGEOUS

customer_reviews.title: Bliss cream
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this body/hand cream. The scent is so calming, if you buy this you I’ll be very please with your choose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product !
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing lotion ! I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Marie Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Bliss is the best..
customer_reviews.text: Bliss is the best.... especially Lemon Sage. Now I only sleep at W Hotels b/c they hooked me on the stuff
customer_reviews.author: jesse wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs quickly and sort of dries to a powdery finish. Love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lotion with a light smell that is pleasant. Good job! The lotion itself does a great job and is not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love your Product.
customer_reviews.text: The weight, scent and feel of the lotion. Not too heavy or too light. The scent is wonderful. I am happy to know I can buy your product, now at Target...i used to buy it at Kohls but haven't seen it there...so I went to Amazon. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE. My new FAVORITE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Clean ingredients! I’m in LOVE with this company!!
customer_reviews.author: 512tayj

customer_reviews.title: lemon
customer_reviews.text: like the scent. I just hope the moisture stayed on longer.
customer_reviews.author: heak Son

customer_reviews.title: I would probably try it again  maybe even in a different scent.
customer_reviews.text: The cream is not a rich as I expected. It seems to have a higher water content than expected However, it does absorb quickly. The scent is very pleasant and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: smells delightful .... no stickiness at all, just moisturizing. Even my fella can stand using it every now & again :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this, very light but nice scent and don’t need but a dimes worth on each body part to get good coverage. Makes skin very soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: TAHop

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell it’s refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Great smell. I love it! It’s pricy but it’s real good.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Super weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I love Bliss’ products, but after using this I’m not sure it’s the real thing. The smell was WAY OFF and had more in common with a rotten banana than lemons.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Bliss is bliss for my skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bliss lotion. It is non-greasy and absorbs into your skin right away. Smells great. Target used to sell this product and then stopped. I was glad to see that Amazon sells as I was unable to find it at any store.
customer_reviews.author: CatZ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. I first came across it at a nice hotel and then just had to have more. It is non-greasy, overly scent and leaves my hands feeling soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: dmmarmion

customer_reviews.title: Sage is antibacterial
customer_reviews.text: Bliss is a great product depending on what you want. N the sage is a antibacterial
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t moisturize
customer_reviews.text: This does nothing to my skin Makes it wet after applying then my skin is dry same as it was before using . No good moisturizing as promised Yet not worth the price . Nice smell though
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Smells great and really seals in the moisture. My legs feel like silk.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I originally started using this body butter in in Spain at the W hotel. It is the only lotion from a hotel I actually like/love. Not greasy and it’s soft a feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Jon P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Butter EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product forever and it's the only product (regardless of the cost) that make the little bumps on my arms disappear completely. Totally worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Sue Simione

customer_reviews.title: bliss body butter
customer_reviews.text: I am comparing it to the nivea cream and do not find it work any better or worse except bliss is more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, luxurious, wonderful lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells AMAZING. The lemon scent is strong without being overpowering or smelling like a dessert. It's nice and thick without being greasy, and it absorbs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good smell and feel
customer_reviews.text: good amount of moisture and a good scent that's not overwhelming
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Smells fantastic. Absorbs nicely. Got some more for my friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Def Worth A Buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. This is the best body butter, my skin is so soft and I wasn't sticky or greasy after applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden A.

customer_reviews.title: Not the stated scent
customer_reviews.text: This was not the lemon and sage scent as described, but orange and white pepper. Not accurately described.
customer_reviews.author: MLNJ

customer_reviews.title: Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent! Great lotion! I shared the second with our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: PREICH

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion and the size of this bottle! The pump is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bliss lotion! The scent of the lemon & sage is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like its flavour and its moisturising are very different from any other lotions. I truly love it
customer_reviews.author: Masud Alam

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. It just seem to soak into your skin! Skin feels soft but not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Ballrmum

customer_reviews.title: It's soft & buttery without a greasy heavy feel. Very light & refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It smells so delicious, light & clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bliss is just the best
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. It is a great light weight moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Brown

customer_reviews.title: Relieved chapped, dry and flaky elbows!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. It was first cream to actually soften my extremely dry and chapped elbows and it removed flaky skin on elbows well.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

product_meta.title: bliss Body Butter, Paraben Free Maximum Moisture Cream, Body Lotion For Dry Skin, Instant Long-Lasting Moisturizer for Women & Men, Lemon & Sage, 6.7 Fl Oz
feature_bullets: GET SOFT, SUPPLE SKIN with our rich, hydrating formula made with shea butter, coconut oil, algae extracts and other soothing ingredients to moisturize from head to toe
SMELL FRESH AND CLEAN with our lightweight and iconic Lemon & Sage scent that energizes and refreshes
KEEP SKIN HYDRATED post-shave, shower or anytime throughout the day!
100% FREE OF HARSH CHEMICALS including parabens, phthalates, SLS, SLES and more, as well as PETA-certified and cruelty-free
